snippet.title: Pathankot attack due to Punjab Police's lackadaisical attitude towards terror alert?

localized.description:
On News Point, we ask BJP Spokesperson GVL Narsimha Rao whether the Punjab Police was callous towards an SP of its own police force alerting them about the presence of terrorists. Though the Centre claims that the NSG commandos had reached the spot in advance, we ask whether the entry of terrorists into the airbase could have been prevented. (Audio in Hindi)
Watch full video: http://khabar.ndtv.com/video/show/news-point/news-point-questions-raises-over-pathankot-attack-397545?yt
Download the NDTV news app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.july.ndtv&referrer=utm_source%3Dyoutubecards%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dyoutube
